internal.content: --- title: "report" --- report-toolkit API @report-toolkit/common report A representation of a Diagnostic Report ## Type aliases ### ReportLike Ƭ **ReportLike**: *any* Either a [Report](../classes/report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx) or an object with all of the required props. See [Report.isReportLike](../classes/report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx#static-isreportlike) ## Functions ### createReport ▸ **createReport**(`rawReport`: any, `filepath`: string): *Readonly‹[Report](../classes/report_toolkit_common.report.report)›* Creates a read-only [Report](../classes/report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx) from a [ReportLike](report_toolkit_common.report.mdx#reportlike) value. Use this instead of `new Report()`! **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `rawReport` | any | - | `filepath` | string | | **Returns:** *Readonly‹[Report](../classes/report_toolkit_common.report.report)›* ___ ### isReport ▸ **isReport**(`value`: any): *boolean* Returns `true` if the value is an object having a property `report-toolkit-report` `Symbol` with value `true`. **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `value` | any | | **Returns:** *boolean* ___ ### isReportLike ▸ **isReportLike**(`value`: any): *boolean* Returns `true` if `value` has all expected root properties of a Diagnostic Report (as returned by [process.report.getReport()](https://nodejs.org/api/process.html#process_process_report_getreport_err)), or is a [Report](../classes/report_toolkit_common.report.report.mdx). **Parameters:** Name | Type | Description | ------ | ------ | ------ | `value` | any | | **Returns:** *boolean*
